_header: Saint John tells us a tale
Note: For the Narratio occurring separately see 5184; for the text of the Gospel in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4938.
Subjects: Thomas of Canterbury, saint; sermon texts, Gospel
_description: Gospel for the Second Sunday after Epiphany in the Northern Homily Cycle, with a short Narratio, The Mother of St. Thomas of Canterbury

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte Ione tellis vs a taleIn þis gospell of a
                    bridale…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde lene vs grace þat we mayeDrink wyne wiþ
                    him þat lastis aye

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion telleþ vs a taleIn vr gospel of a
                    Bruytdale…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vr lord ȝif vs grace þat we mayDrinke wiþ him
                    wyn þat lasteþ ay. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Nupcie facte sunt in Cana Galilee (f. 176ra)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Ione telles vs a taleIn oure godspelle of a
                    bridale…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Ihesu til vs ȝou birle þis wyneIn þi grete
                    blisse þat may noght fyne
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica secunda post octavam epiphanie secundum Iohannem (p.
                    61)

CULDd11.First Lines:
…And seþþe whan men drunkin areþan ȝyue
                    þei hem wyn weykere…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…oure lord ȝyue vs grace þat we maydrinke wiþ
                    him wyn pat lastiþ ay
CULDd11.Note: Lines 1-48 missing due to lost folio.

CULGg531.First Lines:
Sant Iohn tels vs a taleIn oure gospell of a
                    brydall…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Oure lord lene vs grace þat we mayDrynk with hym wyne
                    þat lastes ay
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Dominica secunda Post octavas Epiphanie secundum Iohannem (f.
                    37)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint Iohn telles vs a taileIn our gospell of a
                    brydaile…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Our lorde len vs þat we mayDrynk wyth hym wyne þat
                    lastes ay

EDCPCM.First Lines:
sain Ion telles us a talleIn our godspel of a
                    bridale…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…Our lauerd len us þat we maiDrinc wit him wyn þat
                    lastes ay
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima post octavam epiphanie secundum Johannem (f.
                    30ra)

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Seint Ion tellyth vs a taleIn oure gospell of a
                    brydale…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…Oure loueryd lene vs grace þat we mayDryng with hym wyne
                    þat lestyth ay
